bookAuthors: Bernard Cornwell, Kleber de Souza Andrade
Plot: To stem the Napoleonic tide, Sharpe must capture a fortress—where his wife and infant daughter are trapped—while protecting himself from a fellow officer determined to destroy him.
Characters: Richard Sharpe, Obadiah Hakeswill, Patrick Harper, William Lawford, Teresa Moreno, Thomas Leroy, Arthur Wellesley, 1st Duke of Wellington
